00032 #define CONVOLUTION_CACHE_SIZE (3 * 10)
00033 
00034 #define P1DIST_LINEAR "Linear"
00035 #define P1DIST_LOG "Log"
00036 #define P1DIST_RECIPROCAL "Reciprocal"
00037 
00038 #define f(x) ((p1Dist()->to_str() == P1DIST_LINEAR) ? (1-(x)) * p1min + (x) * p1max : \
00039           ((p1Dist()->to_str() == P1DIST_LOG) ? p1min * exp((x) * log(p1max/p1min)) : \
00040            1/((1-(x))/p1min + (x)/p1max)))
00041          
00042 class XRelaxFuncPlot : public XFuncPlot
00043 {
00044     XNODE_OBJECT
00045 protected:
00046     XRelaxFuncPlot(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph
00047                    , const shared_ptr<XItemNode < XRelaxFuncList, XRelaxFunc > >  &item,
00048                    const shared_ptr<XNMRT1> &owner) 
00049         : XFuncPlot(name, runtime, graph), m_item(item), m_owner(owner)
00050     {}
00051 public:
00052     ~XRelaxFuncPlot() {}
00053     virtual double func(double t) const
00054     {
00055         shared_ptr<XRelaxFunc> func1 = *m_item;
00056         if(!func1) return 0;
00057         shared_ptr<XNMRT1> owner = m_owner.lock();
00058         if(!owner) return 0;
00059         double f, df;
00060         double it1 = owner->m_params[0];
00061         double c = owner->m_params[1];
00062         double a = owner->m_params[2];
00063         func1->relax(&f, &df, t, it1);
00064         return c * f + a;
00065     }
00066 private:
00067     shared_ptr<XItemNode < XRelaxFuncList, XRelaxFunc > > m_item;
00068     weak_ptr<XNMRT1> m_owner;
00069 };

00100                       "RelaxFunc", false, m_relaxFuncs, true)),

00103       m_fitStatus(create<XStringNode>("FitStatus", true)),
00104       m_solver(create<SpectrumSolverWrapper>("SpectrumSolver", true, shared_ptr<XComboNode>(), m_windowFunc, shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>())),
00105       m_form(new FrmNMRT1(g_pFrmMain)),
00106       m_statusPrinter(XStatusPrinter::create(m_form.get())),
00107       m_wave(create<XWaveNGraph>("Wave", true, m_form->m_graph, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump)) {
00108     m_form->m_btnClear->setIcon(
00109         KIconLoader::global()->loadIcon("editdelete",
00110                                                                 KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );

00112         KIconLoader::global()->loadIcon("reload",
00113                                                                 KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );
00114     
00115     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("NMR Relax. Meas. - ") + getLabel() );
00116   
00117     scalarentries->insert(t1inv());
00118     scalarentries->insert(t1invErr());
00119     
00120     connect(pulser(), true);
00121     connect(pulse1(), false);
00122     connect(pulse2(), false);
00123 
00124     m_windowFunc->value(SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING);
00125     m_windowWidthList.push_back(0.25);
00126     m_windowWidthList.push_back(0.5);
00127 //    m_windowWidthList.push_back(0.75);
00128     m_windowWidthList.push_back(1.0);
00129 //    m_windowWidthList.push_back(1.25);
00130     m_windowWidthList.push_back(1.5);
00131     m_windowWidthList.push_back(2.0);
00132     m_windowWidth->add("25%");
00133     m_windowWidth->add("50%");
00134 //    m_windowWidth->add("75%");
00135     m_windowWidth->add("100%");
00136 //    m_windowWidth->add("125%");
00137     m_windowWidth->add("150%");
00138     m_windowWidth->add("200%");
00139     m_windowWidth->value(2);
00140     {
00141         const char *labels[] = {"P1 [ms] or 2Tau [us]", "Intens [V]",
00142                                 "Weight [1/V]", "Abs [V]", "Re [V]", "Im [V]"};
00143         m_wave->setColCount(6, labels);
00144         m_wave->insertPlot(i18n("Relaxation"), 0, 1, -1, 2);

00150         m_wave->plot(0)->drawLines()->value(false);
00151         m_wave->plot(1)->drawLines()->value(false);
00152         m_wave->plot(1)->intensity()->value(0.6);
00153         shared_ptr<XFuncPlot> plot3 = create<XRelaxFuncPlot>(
00154             "FittedCurve", true, m_wave->graph(),
00155             relaxFunc(), dynamic_pointer_cast<XNMRT1>(shared_from_this()));
00156         m_wave->graph()->plots()->insert(plot3);
00157         plot3->label()->value(i18n("Fitted Curve"));
00158         plot3->axisX()->value(axisx);
00159         plot3->axisY()->value(axisy);
00160         plot3->drawPoints()->value(false);
00161         plot3->pointColor()->value(clBlue);
00162         plot3->lineColor()->value(clBlue);
00163         plot3->drawBars()->setUIEnabled(false);
00164         plot3->barColor()->setUIEnabled(false);
00165         plot3->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00166         m_wave->clear();
00167     }
00168 
00169     mode()->add("T1 Measurement");
00170     mode()->add("T2 Measurement");
00171     mode()->add("St.E. Measurement");
00172     mode()->value(MEAS_T1);
00173     
00174     p1Dist()->add(P1DIST_LINEAR);
00175     p1Dist()->add(P1DIST_LOG);
00176     p1Dist()->add(P1DIST_RECIPROCAL);
00177     p1Dist()->value(1);
00178 
00179     try {
00180         relaxFunc()->str(XString("NMR I=1/2"));
00181     }
00182     catch (XKameError &e) {
00183         e.print();
00184     }
00185     p1Min()->value(1.0);
00186     p1Max()->value(100.0);
00187     autoPhase()->value(true);
00188     autoWindow()->value(true);
00189     mInftyFit()->value(true);
00190     smoothSamples()->value(200);
00191 
00192     m_conP1Min = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_p1Min, m_form->m_edP1Min);
00193     m_conP1Max = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_p1Max, m_form->m_edP1Max);
00194     m_conPhase = xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>(m_phase, m_form->m_numPhase);
00195     m_conFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freq, m_form->m_edFreq);
00196     m_conAutoWindow = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_autoWindow, m_form->m_ckbAutoWindow);
00197     m_conWindowFunc = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_windowFunc, m_form->m_cmbWindowFunc);
00198     m_conWindowWidth = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_windowWidth, m_form->m_cmbWindowWidth);

00200     m_conP1Dist = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_p1Dist, m_form->m_cmbP1Dist);
00201     m_conClearAll = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_clearAll, m_form->m_btnClear);
00202     m_conResetFit = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_resetFit, m_form->m_btnResetFit);

00204     m_conAutoPhase = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_autoPhase, m_form->m_ckbAutoPhase);
00205     m_conMInftyFit = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_mInftyFit, m_form->m_ckbMInftyFit);
00206     m_conAbsFit = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_absFit, m_form->m_ckbAbsFit);
00207     m_conFitStatus = xqcon_create<XQTextBrowserConnector>(m_fitStatus, m_form->m_txtFitStatus);
00208     m_conRelaxFunc = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_relaxFunc, m_form->m_cmbRelaxFunc);
00209     m_conMode = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_mode, m_form->m_cmbMode);
00210

00213     m_conPulse2 = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_pulse2, m_form->m_cmbPulse2);
00214

00216         shared_from_this(), &XNMRT1::onActiveChanged);

00218         shared_from_this(), &XNMRT1::onCondChanged);
00219     p1Min()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00220     phase()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00221     smoothSamples()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00222     mInftyFit()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00223     absFit()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00224     relaxFunc()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00225     autoPhase()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00226     freq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00227     autoWindow()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00228     windowFunc()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00229     windowWidth()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00230     mode()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00231   
00232     m_lsnOnClearAll = m_clearAll->onTouch().connectWeak(
00233         shared_from_this(), &XNMRT1::onClearAll);
00234     m_lsnOnResetFit = m_resetFit->onTouch().connectWeak(
00235         shared_from_this(), &XNMRT1::onResetFit);

00237 void
00238 XNMRT1::showForms()
00239 {
00240     m_form->show();
00241     m_form->raise();
00242 }
00243 
00244 void
00245 XNMRT1::onClearAll(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00246 {
00247     m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00248     requestAnalysis();
00249 }
00250 void
00251 XNMRT1::onResetFit(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00252 {
00253     const double x = randMT19937();
00254     const double p1min = *p1Min();
00255     const double p1max = *p1Max();
00256     if((p1min <= 0) || (p1min >= p1max)) {
00257         gErrPrint(i18n("Invalid P1Min or P1Max."));
00258         return;
00259     }
00260     m_params[0] = 1.0 / f(x);
00261     m_params[1] = 0.1;
00262     m_params[2] = 0.0;
00263     requestAnalysis();
00264 }
00265 void
00266 XNMRT1::onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node)
00267 {
00268     if((node == phase()) && *autoPhase()) return;
00269     if(((node == windowWidth()) || (node == windowFunc())) && *autoWindow()) return;
00270     if(
00271         (node == mode()) ||
00272         (node == freq())) {
00273         m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00274     }
00275     requestAnalysis();
00276 }
00277 void
00278 XNMRT1::analyzeSpectrum(
00279     const std::vector< std::complex<double> >&wave, int origin, double cf,
00280     std::deque<std::complex<double> > &value_by_cond) {
00281     value_by_cond.clear();
00282     std::deque<FFT::twindowfunc> funcs;
00283     m_solver->windowFuncs(funcs);
00284 
00285     int idx = 0;
00286     for(std::deque<double>::iterator wit = m_windowWidthList.begin(); wit != m_windowWidthList.end(); wit++) {
00287         for(std::deque<FFT::twindowfunc>::iterator fit = funcs.begin(); fit != funcs.end(); fit++) {
00288             if(m_convolutionCache.size() <= idx) {
00289                 m_convolutionCache.push_back(shared_ptr<ConvolutionCache>(new ConvolutionCache));
00290             }
00291             shared_ptr<ConvolutionCache> cache = m_convolutionCache[idx];
00292             if((cache->windowwidth != *wit) || (cache->origin != origin) ||
00293                 (cache->windowfunc != *fit) || (cache->cfreq != cf) ||
00294                 (cache->wave.size() != wave.size())) {
00295                 cache->windowwidth = *wit;
00296                 cache->origin = origin;
00297                 cache->windowfunc = *fit;
00298                 cache->cfreq = cf;
00299                 cache->power = 0.0;
00300                 cache->wave.resize(wave.size());
00301                 double wk = 1.0 / FFTSolver::windowLength(wave.size(), -origin, *wit);
00302                 for(int i = 0; i < (int)wave.size(); i++) {
00303                     double w = (*fit)((i - origin) * wk) / (double)wave.size();
00304                     cache->wave[i] = std::polar(w, -2.0*M_PI*cf*(i - origin));
00305                     cache->power += w*w;
00306                 }
00307             }
00308             
00309             std::complex<double> z(0.0);
00310             for(int i = 0; i < (int)cache->wave.size(); i++) {
00311                 z += wave[i] * cache->wave[i];
00312             }
00313             
00314 //          m_solver->solver()->exec(wave, fftout, -origin, 0.0, *fit, *wit);
00315 //          value_by_cond.push_back(fftout[(cf + fftlen) % fftlen]);
00316             value_by_cond.push_back(z);
00317             idx++;
00318         }
00319     }
00320 }
00321 bool
00322 XNMRT1::checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const {
00323     shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser = *pulser();
00324     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse1 = *pulse1();
00325     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse2 = *pulse2();
00326     if(!_pulser || !_pulse1) return false;
00327     if(emitter == shared_from_this()) return true;
00328     if(emitter == _pulser) return false;
00329     if(_pulser->time() > _pulse1->time()) return false;
00330     
00331 //  if (_pulser->time() > _pulse1->time())
00332 //      return false;
00333         
00334     switch(_pulser->combModeRecorded()) {
00335     default:
00336         return true;
00337     case XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_COMB_ALT:
00338     case XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_P1_ALT:
00339         if(!_pulse2) {
00340             m_statusPrinter->printError(i18n("2 Pulse Analyzers needed."));
00341             return false;
00342         }
00343         if(_pulse1->time() != _pulse2->time()) return false;
00344         return true;
00345     }    
00346 //    return (_pulser->time() < _pulse1->timeAwared()) && (_pulser->time() < _pulse1->time());
00347 }
00348 
00349 void
00350 XNMRT1::analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) throw (XRecordError&)
00351 {
00352     const double p1min = *p1Min();
00353     const double p1max = *p1Max();
00354     
00355     if((p1min <= 0) || (p1min >= p1max)) {
00356         throw XRecordError(i18n("Invalid P1Min or P1Max."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00357     }
00358 
00359     const int samples = *smoothSamples();
00360     if(samples <= 10) {
00361         throw XRecordError(i18n("Invalid # of Samples."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00362     }
00363     if(samples >= 100000) {
00364         m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Too many Samples."), true);
00365     }
00366 
00367     int _mode = *mode();
00368     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse1 = *pulse1();
00369     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse2 = *pulse2();
00370     
00371     shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser = *pulser();
00372     ASSERT( _pulser );
00373     if(_pulser->time()) {
00374         //Check consitency.
00375         switch (_mode) {
00376         case MEAS_T1:
00377             break;
00378         case MEAS_T2:
00379             break;
00380         case MEAS_ST_E:
00381             if((_pulser->tauRecorded() != _pulser->combPTRecorded()) ||
00382                     (_pulser->combNumRecorded() != 2) ||
00383                     (!*_pulser->conserveStEPhase()) ||
00384                     (_pulser->pw1Recorded() != 0.0) ||
00385                     (_pulser->pw2Recorded() != _pulser->combPWRecorded()))
00386                 m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Strange St.E. settings."));
00387             break;
00388         }
00389     }
00390     
00391     // read spectra from NMRPulseAnalyzers
00392     if( emitter != shared_from_this() ) {
00393         ASSERT( _pulse1 );
00394         ASSERT( _pulse1->time() );
00395         ASSERT( _pulser->time() );
00396         ASSERT( emitter != _pulser );
00397         
00398         if(*_pulse1->exAvgIncr()) {
00399             m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Do NOT use incremental avg. Skipping."));
00400             throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00401         }
00402         
00403         bool _active = *active();
00404       
00405         std::deque<std::complex<double> > cmp1, cmp2;
00406         double cfreq = *freq() * 1e3 * _pulse1->interval();
00407         analyzeSpectrum(_pulse1->wave(), _pulse1->waveFTPos(), cfreq, cmp1);
00408         RawPt pt1, pt2;
00409         if(_pulse2) {
00410             analyzeSpectrum(_pulse2->wave(), _pulse2->waveFTPos(), cfreq, cmp2);
00411             pt2.value_by_cond.resize(cmp2.size());
00412         }
00413         pt1.value_by_cond.resize(cmp1.size());
00414         switch(_pulser->combModeRecorded()) {
00415         default:
00416             throw XRecordError(i18n("Unknown Comb Mode!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00417         case XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_COMB_ALT:
00418             if(_mode != MEAS_T1) throw XRecordError(i18n("Use T1 mode!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00419             ASSERT(_pulse2);
00420             pt1.p1 = _pulser->combP1Recorded();
00421             for(int i = 0; i < cmp1.size(); i++)
00422                 pt1.value_by_cond[i] = (cmp1[i] - cmp2[i]) / cmp1[i];
00423             m_pts.push_back(pt1);
00424             break;
00425         case XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_P1_ALT:
00426             if(_mode == MEAS_T2) 
00427                 throw XRecordError(i18n("Do not use T2 mode!"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00428             ASSERT(_pulse2);
00429             pt1.p1 = _pulser->combP1Recorded();
00430             std::copy(cmp1.begin(), cmp1.end(), pt1.value_by_cond.begin());
00431             m_pts.push_back(pt1);
00432             pt2.p1 = _pulser->combP1AltRecorded();
00433             std::copy(cmp2.begin(), cmp2.end(), pt2.value_by_cond.begin());
00434             m_pts.push_back(pt2);
00435             break;
00436         case XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_ON:
00437             if(_mode != MEAS_T2) {
00438                 pt1.p1 = _pulser->combP1Recorded();
00439                 std::copy(cmp1.begin(), cmp1.end(), pt1.value_by_cond.begin());
00440                 m_pts.push_back(pt1);
00441                 break;
00442             }
00443             m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("T2 mode with comb pulse!"));
00444         case XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_OFF:
00445             if(_mode != MEAS_T2) {
00446                 m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Do not use T1 mode! Skipping."));
00447                 throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00448             }
00449             //T2 measurement
00450             pt1.p1 = 2.0 * _pulser->tauRecorded();
00451             std::copy(cmp1.begin(), cmp1.end(), pt1.value_by_cond.begin());
00452             m_pts.push_back(pt1);
00453             break;
00454         }
00455 
00456         //set new P1s
00457         if(_active) {
00458             unlockConnection(_pulser);
00459             double x = randMT19937();
00460             double np1, np2;
00461             np1 = f(x);
00462             np2 = f(1-x);
00463             _pulser->output()->value(false);
00464             switch (_mode) {
00465             case MEAS_T1:
00466             case MEAS_ST_E:
00467                 _pulser->combP1()->value(np1);
00468                 _pulser->combP1Alt()->value(np2);
00469                 break;
00470             case MEAS_T2:
00471                 _pulser->tau()->value(np1 / 2.0);
00472                 break;
00473             }
00474             _pulser->output()->value(true);
00475         }
00476     }
00477   
00478     m_sumpts.clear();
00479   
00480     if(m_timeClearRequested > _pulse1->timeAwared()) {
00481         m_pts.clear();
00482         m_wave->clear();
00483         m_fitStatus->value("");
00484         _pulse1->avgClear()->touch();
00485         if(_pulse2)
00486             _pulse2->avgClear()->touch();
00487         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00488     }
00489   
00490     shared_ptr<XRelaxFunc> func = *relaxFunc();
00491     if(!func) {
00492         throw XRecordError(i18n("Please select relaxation func."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00493     }
00494   
00495     m_sumpts.resize(samples);
00496 
00497     Pt dummy;
00498     dummy.c = 0; dummy.p1 = 0; dummy.isigma = 0;
00499     dummy.value_by_cond.resize(m_convolutionCache.size());
00500     std::fill(m_sumpts.begin(), m_sumpts.end(), dummy);
00501     double k = m_sumpts.size() / log(p1max/p1min);
00502     for(std::deque<RawPt>::iterator it = m_pts.begin(); it != m_pts.end(); it++) {
00503         int idx = lrint(log(it->p1 / p1min) * k);
00504         if((idx < 0) || (idx >= (int)m_sumpts.size())) continue;
00505         double p1 = it->p1;
00506         //For St.E., T+tau = P1+3*tau. 
00507         if(_mode == MEAS_ST_E)
00508             p1 += 3 * _pulser->tauRecorded() * 1e-3;
00509         m_sumpts[idx].isigma += 1.0;
00510         m_sumpts[idx].p1 += p1;
00511         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < it->value_by_cond.size(); i++)
00512             m_sumpts[idx].value_by_cond[i] += it->value_by_cond[i];
00513     }
00514 
00515     std::deque<std::complex<double> > sum_c(m_convolutionCache.size()), corr(m_convolutionCache.size());
00516     double sum_t = 0.0;
00517     int n = 0;
00518     for(std::deque<Pt>::iterator it = m_sumpts.begin(); it != m_sumpts.end(); it++) {
00519         if(it->isigma == 0) continue;
00520         double t = log10(it->p1 / it->isigma);
00521         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < it->value_by_cond.size(); i++) {
00522             sum_c[i] += it->value_by_cond[i];
00523             corr[i] += it->value_by_cond[i] * t;
00524         }
00525         sum_t += t;
00526         n++;
00527     }
00528     if(n == 0)
00529         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00530     
00531     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < corr.size(); i++) {
00532         corr[i] -= sum_c[i]*sum_t/(double)n;
00533         corr[i] *= ((_mode == MEAS_T1) ? 1 : -1);
00534     }
00535     
00536     bool _absfit = *absFit();
00537     
00538     std::deque<double> phase_by_cond(corr.size(), *phase() / 180.0 * M_PI);
00539     int cond = -1;
00540     double maxsn2 = 0.0;
00541     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < corr.size(); i++) {
00542         if(*autoPhase()) {
00543             phase_by_cond[i] = std::arg(corr[i]);
00544         }
00545         if(*autoWindow()) {
00546             double sn2 = _absfit ? std::abs(corr[i]) : std::real(corr[i] * std::polar(1.0, -phase_by_cond[i]));
00547             sn2 = sn2 * sn2 / m_convolutionCache[i]->power;
00548             if(maxsn2 < sn2) {
00549                 maxsn2 = sn2;
00550                 cond = i;
00551             }
00552         }
00553     }
00554     if(cond < 0) {
00555         cond = 0;
00556         for(std::deque<shared_ptr<ConvolutionCache> >::iterator it = m_convolutionCache.begin();
00557             it != m_convolutionCache.end(); it++) {
00558             if((m_windowWidthList[std::max(0, (int)*windowWidth())] == (*it)->windowwidth) &&
00559                 (m_solver->windowFunc() == (*it)->windowfunc)) {
00560                 break;
00561             }
00562             cond++;
00563         }
00564     }
00565     if(cond >= (m_convolutionCache.size())) {
00566         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00567     }
00568     double ph = phase_by_cond[cond];
00569     if(*autoPhase()) {
00570         phase()->value(ph / M_PI * 180);
00571     }
00572     if(*autoWindow()) {
00573         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_windowWidthList.size(); i++) {
00574             if(m_windowWidthList[i] == m_convolutionCache[cond]->windowwidth)
00575                 windowWidth()->value(i);
00576         }
00577         std::deque<FFT::twindowfunc> funcs;
00578         m_solver->windowFuncs(funcs);
00579         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < funcs.size(); i++) {
00580             if(funcs[i] == m_convolutionCache[cond]->windowfunc)
00581                 windowFunc()->value(i);
00582         }
00583     }
00584     std::complex<double> cph(std::polar(1.0, -phase_by_cond[cond]));
00585     for(std::deque<Pt>::iterator it = m_sumpts.begin(); it != m_sumpts.end(); it++) {
00586         if(it->isigma == 0) continue;
00587         it->p1 = it->p1 / it->isigma;
00588         it->c =  it->value_by_cond[cond] * cph / it->isigma;
00589         it->var = (_absfit) ? std::abs(it->c) : std::real(it->c);
00590         it->isigma = sqrt(it->isigma);
00591     }
00592 
00593     m_fitStatus->value(iterate(func, 4));
00594 
00595     t1inv()->value(1000.0 * m_params[0]);
00596     t1invErr()->value(1000.0 * m_errors[0]);
00597 }
00598 
00599 void
00600 XNMRT1::visualize()
00601 {
00602     if(!time()) {
00603         m_wave->clear();
00604         return;
00605     }
00606 
00607     {   XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave);
00608     XString label;
00609     switch (*mode()) {
00610     case MEAS_T1:
00611         label = "P1 [ms]";
00612         break;
00613     case MEAS_T2:
00614         label = "2tau [us]";
00615         break;
00616     case MEAS_ST_E:
00617         label = "T+tau [ms]";
00618         break;
00619     }
00620     m_wave->setLabel(0, label.c_str());
00621     m_wave->axisx()->label()->value(label);
00622     m_wave->setRowCount(m_sumpts.size());
00623     double *colp1 = m_wave->cols(0);
00624     double *colval = m_wave->cols(1);
00625     double *colabs = m_wave->cols(3);
00626     double *colre = m_wave->cols(4);
00627     double *colim = m_wave->cols(5);
00628     double *colisigma = m_wave->cols(2);
00629     int i = 0;
00630     for(std::deque<Pt>::iterator it = m_sumpts.begin(); it != m_sumpts.end(); it++) {
00631         if(it->isigma == 0) {
00632             colval[i] = 0;
00633             colabs[i] = 0;
00634             colre[i] = 0;
00635             colim[i] = 0;
00636             colp1[i] = 0;
00637         }
00638         else {
00639             colval[i] = it->var;
00640             colabs[i] = std::abs(it->c);
00641             colre[i] = std::real(it->c);
00642             colim[i] = std::imag(it->c);
00643             colp1[i] = it->p1;
00644         }
00645         colisigma[i] = it->isigma;
00646         i++;
00647     }
00648     }
00649 }
00650   
00651 void
00652 XNMRT1::onActiveChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00653 {
00654     if(*active() == true)
00655     {
00656         const shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser = *pulser();
00657         const shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse1 = *pulse1();
00658         const shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse2 = *pulse2();
00659 
00660         onClearAll(shared_from_this());
00661         if(!_pulser || !_pulse1) {
00662             gErrPrint(getLabel() + ": " + i18n("No pulser or No NMR Pulse Analyzer."));
00663             return;
00664         }
00665       
00666         if(_pulse2 && 
00667            ((*_pulser->combMode() == XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_COMB_ALT) ||
00668             (*_pulser->combMode() == XPulser::N_COMB_MODE_P1_ALT))) {
00669             _pulse2->fromTrig()->value(
00670                 *_pulse1->fromTrig() + *_pulser->altSep());
00671             _pulse2->width()->value(*_pulse1->width());
00672             _pulse2->phaseAdv()->value(*_pulse1->phaseAdv());
00673             _pulse2->bgPos()->value(
00674                 *_pulse1->bgPos() + *_pulser->altSep());
00675             _pulse2->bgWidth()->value(*_pulse1->bgWidth());
00676             _pulse2->fftPos()->value(
00677                 *_pulse1->fftPos() + *_pulser->altSep());
00678             _pulse2->fftLen()->value(*_pulse1->fftLen());
00679             _pulse2->windowFunc()->value(*_pulse1->windowFunc());
00680             _pulse2->usePNR()->value(*_pulse1->usePNR());
00681             _pulse2->pnrSolverList()->value(*_pulse1->pnrSolverList());
00682             _pulse2->solverList()->value(*_pulse1->solverList());
00683             _pulse2->numEcho()->value(*_pulse1->numEcho());
00684             _pulse2->echoPeriod()->value(*_pulse1->echoPeriod());
00685         }
00686     }
00687 }
